title: All upcoming Marksman updates in a few words
body:
{{champion:104}} Needs a nerf.
{{champion:42}} Stole Rumble's ult.
{{champion:96}} Pew Pew Pew.
{{champion:133}} The one everyone will cry for buffs for until the pros play her.
{{champion:51}} Hardscoping pleb.
{{champion:21}} Denting blows.

replies.body:
all these marksman changes and urgot still gets the smallest buffs. not that he really needs it tbh, its just being least played and consistently sub-50% winrate is probably a good definition of a champ in need of a change.

i dont think quinn will be in pro play past april. caitlyn will have an even higher reason not to be picked (buffs to stronger adcs). the kogmaw attack speed cap increase is different but it still seems pretty lazy
Caitlyn can 1-shot with her free headshot late game, the headshot scales with crit now I believe.
Urgot is being reworked I believe. Looks like the rework wasn't ready to roll out in the pre-season patch, it should come early Season 6 though.
